title: 66 Walkthrough bus. Sea blue / white w patina

posts.content:
'66 Walkthrough bus. Price: Â£13,995

German built bus, imported from the USA.

Great project bus with some good patina / paint fade.
Rust around the roof is just surface, no soft spots or holes.
Needs some lower body resto.
The longside has had a sill riveted on which should be easy to put right as they have not welded it so no distortion. Needs lower body resto but pretty good underneath.
Body overall straight with no collision damage only a few dents as shown in pics.
Nice dash.
Ideal bus to do the repairs and some paint blending then run as is.
No motor.
A file of around 160 pics will tell the full story.
http://s174.photobucket.com/user/fbivw/ ... ough%20Bus

Delivery no problem in the UK and assistance with shipping elsewhere.
